showerReviews.reviewText: Well worth the price.  Site pads were concrete and level. The highlight was the private showers. Probably the cleanest shower rooms I have ever seen. Each one has a toilet, sink, shower, place to sit and a large mirror. Water was very hot and plentiful.  Will be staying here again on our return trip.

We travel with our dog most of the time and we LOVE that they have dog parks in most locations. The dog park in this location is very clean and well maintained. It has two separate areas for dogs and my furry friend loves it. We always make sure to stop at Loves.

This was the greatest RV stop by far that we have made on our trip to Ft Collins.
